meanings.definition: Having a great volume or intensity in sound
meanings.sent1: The music was loud and made my ears ring.
meanings.sent2: The loud thunder scared the little dog.
meanings.sent3: The loud alarm clock woke me up in a panic.
meanings.sent4: Her loud laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The loud roar of the crowd echoed through the stadium.

meanings.definition: Making a strong impression on the senses; noticeable
meanings.sent1: The bright colors on the painting were loud and vibrant.
meanings.sent2: Her loud perfume could be smelled from across the room.
meanings.sent3: The loud pattern on his shirt made my eyes hurt.
meanings.sent4: His loud tie stood out among the sea of plain suits.
meanings.sent5: The loud fireworks lit up the night sky with bursts of color.
